trans-unit.source: Defines an area that receives and displays ink strokes.
trans-unit.target: Define uma área que recebe e exibe traços de tinta.

trans-unit.source: An InkCanvas is an element that can be used to receive and display ink input.
trans-unit.target: Um InkCanvas é um elemento que pode ser usado para receber e exibir a entrada à tinta.

trans-unit.source: This is commonly done through the use of a stylus, which interacts with a digitizer to produce ink strokes using a stylus or a mouse.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, isso é feito com o uso de uma caneta, que interage com um digitalizador para produzir traços de tinta usando uma caneta ou mouse.

trans-unit.source: The created strokes are represented as <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> objects, and can be manipulated either programmatically or based on user input.
trans-unit.target: Os traços criados são representados como <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>objetos e podem ser manipulados seja programaticamente ou com base na entrada do usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The InkCanvas enables users to modify or delete an existing <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: InkCanvas permite que os usuários modificar ou excluir um existente <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The InkCanvas can be bound to a data source.
trans-unit.target: InkCanvas pode ser associado a uma fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> property to: a base-64, encoded string that contains ink data in Ink Serialized format (ISF); or even to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> property of another InkCanvas.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode vincular o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>propriedade: uma cadeia de caracteres base-64, codificada que contém tinta dados ISF formatar (ISF); ou até mesmo para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>propriedade de outro InkCanvas.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also bind properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>, to other data sources.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode associar propriedades, como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>, para outras fontes de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the InkCanvas class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe InkCanvas.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current editing mode of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o modo de edição atual do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ActiveEditingMode property indicates the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ActiveEditingMode indica a atual <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>

trans-unit.source: Suppose that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.
trans-unit.target: Suponha que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>está definido e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>o que <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A>é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the tablet pen is used in an inverted position, ActiveEditingMode has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.
trans-unit.target: Quando a caneta é usada em uma posição invertida, ActiveEditingMode tem um valor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, its value is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, seu valor é <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> stores only the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> properties for each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> belonging to a stroke.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>armazena apenas o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>, e <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>Propriedades para cada <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>que pertencem a um stroke.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: You can use the DefaultStylusPointDescription property to store additional information about points comprising the strokes on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar a propriedade DefaultStylusPointDescription para armazenar informações adicionais sobre os pontos que compõem os traços em <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property will affect only new strokes that are made after the property is set.
trans-unit.target: Definir essa propriedade afetará somente novos traçados que são feitos depois que a propriedade está definida.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the renderer that dynamically draws ink on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o renderizador que dinamicamente tinta desenha a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can set the DynamicRenderer property to a custom <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> if you want to customize the ink.
trans-unit.target: Você pode definir a propriedade DynamicRenderer para um personalizado <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>se você quiser personalizar a tinta.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The DynamicRenderer is a member of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusPlugIns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > DynamicRenderer a é membro do <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusPlugIns%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusPlugIns%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set the DynamicRenderer, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> removes the old <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugInCollection> and adds the new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando você define o DynamicRenderer o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>Remove o antigo <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>do <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugInCollection>e adiciona o novo <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>ao final da coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugInCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: This may change the behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode mudar o comportamento de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: The renderer that dynamically draws ink on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O renderizador que dinamicamente desenha tinta no <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user editing mode used by an active pointing device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o usuário usado por um dispositivo apontador ativo do modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: The default EditingMode is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade EditingMode de padrão é <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>

trans-unit.source: Changing the EditingMode clears any existing selections.
trans-unit.target: Alterando a propriedade EditingMode limpa todas as seleções existentes.

trans-unit.source: The EditingMode specifies the mode of the pointing device as it interacts with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade EditingMode Especifica o modo de dispositivo apontador, como ele interage com o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A> is used by some digitizers when the "eraser end" of the stylus contacts the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A>é usado por alguns digitalizadores quando o "fim de borracha" da caneta entra em contato com o digitalizador.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pastes the contents of the Clipboard to the top-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cola o conteúdo da área de transferência para o canto superior esquerdo do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> can support Clipboard data in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] format, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-isf-md.md)], and text format.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>pode oferecer suporte a dados de área de transferência em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] formato, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-isf-md.md)]e o formato de texto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: Pastes the contents of the Clipboard to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref> at a given point.
trans-unit.target: Cola o conteúdo da área de transferência para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref> em um determinado ponto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> can support Clipboard data in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] format, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-isf-md.md)], and text format.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>pode oferecer suporte a dados de área de transferência em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] formato, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-isf-md.md)]e o formato de texto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.target: O ponto no qual colar os traços.

trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os formatos que podem ser colados no <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *InkCanvasClipboardFormats* An array of enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do elemento de propriedade de XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *InkCanvasClipboardFormats* uma matriz de valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Specifying an array in XAML requires `x:Array` usage.
trans-unit.target: Especificando uma matriz em XAML requer `x:Array` uso.

trans-unit.source: Specifying an enumeration value as an element that declares an array member requires `x:Static` usage.
trans-unit.target: Especificando um valor de enumeração como um elemento que declara um membro da matriz requer `x:Static` uso.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [x:Array Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [x:Static Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [extensão de marcação X:array](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [extensão de marcação X:Static](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A collection of enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasClipboardFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasClipboardFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the user can resize selected ink strokes and/or elements on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor booliano que indica se o usuário pode redimensionar traços de tinta selecionado e/ou elementos no <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, an adorner border is drawn around ink strokes and/or elements when they are selected.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade é definida como `true`, uma borda de adorno é desenhada ao redor de traços de tinta e/ou elementos quando eles estiverem selecionados.

trans-unit.source: This border enables the user to resize the selected objects.
trans-unit.target: Essa borda permite que o usuário redimensionar os objetos selecionados.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.MoveEnabled%2A> is `true`, the adorner enables the user to move the strokes and/or elements as well.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.MoveEnabled%2A>é `true`, o adorno permite que o usuário mover o elementos bem e/ou traços.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.MoveEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false` while one or more ink strokes and/or elements are selected, the adorner border is automatically removed from the selected objects.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade é definida como `false` com um ou mais traços de tinta e/ou elementos estiverem selecionados, a borda de adorno será removida automaticamente dos objetos selecionados.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a user can resize strokes and/or elements on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se um usuário pode redimensionar traços e/ou elementos no <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Right%2A?displayProperty=fullName> anexado propertyy.

trans-unit.target: Traços selecionados são exibidos com um adorno contorná-las para facilitar o reconhecimento e manipulação.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised after a set of ink strokes and/or elements has been selected and applied by the user.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado depois que um conjunto de traços de tinta e/ou elementos é selecionado e aplicado pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: If, instead, you must handle a request that select a set of ink strokes and/or elements before the selection is applied, add an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanging> event.
trans-unit.target: Se, em vez disso, você deve tratar uma solicitação que selecionar um conjunto de traços de tinta e/ou elementos antes que a seleção é aplicada, adicione um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanging>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanging>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new set of ink strokes and/or elements is being selected.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um novo conjunto de traços de tinta e/ou elementos é selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The SelectionChanging event is raised when strokes and/or elements are selected by the user - but before the change is applied.
trans-unit.target: O evento SelectionChanging é gerado quando traços e/ou elementos selecionados pelo usuário - mas antes da alteração será aplicada.

trans-unit.source: The SelectionChanging event is processed when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventHandler> receives an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: O evento SelectionChanging é processado quando a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventHandler>recebe um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventArgs>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventArgs> provides methods for accessing <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> objects after they are selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventArgs>fornece métodos para acessar <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>e <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>objetos depois que eles são selecionados pelo usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement></xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: After the change is applied, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Depois que a alteração será aplicada, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanged>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The SelectionChanging event does not occur when the selected strokes are deleted or when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.ActiveEditingMode%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > SelectionChanging o evento ocorre quando os traços são excluídos ou quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.ActiveEditingMode%2A>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.ActiveEditingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the user moves a selection of strokes and/or elements.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois que o usuário move uma seleção de traços e/ou elementos.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs after a selection of strokes and/or elements is moved, but before the stroke or element data is updated to record its new position.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre depois que uma seleção de traços e/ou elementos é movida, mas antes do traço ou um elemento de dados são atualizados para registrar a nova posição.

trans-unit.source: Add an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionMoving> event.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionMoving>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionMoving>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before selected strokes and elements are moved.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes de traços e os elementos são movidos.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs after the user requests that a selection of strokes and/or elements be moved, but before the change is applied.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre depois que o usuário solicita que uma seleção de traços e/ou elementos ser movidos, mas antes da alteração será aplicada.

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives an argument of type <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs> with two properties: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos recebe um argumento de tipo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs>com duas propriedades: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> defines the boundaries of the selection before the move and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A> defines the boundaries of the selection after the move.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A>Define os limites da seleção antes da movimentação e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>define os limites da seleção após a movimentação.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the change is applied, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionMoved> event will occur.
trans-unit.target: Depois que a alteração será aplicada, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionMoved>evento ocorrerá.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionMoved>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a selection of strokes and/or elements has been resized by the user.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma seleção de traços e/ou elementos é redimensionada pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised after a selection of strokes and/or elements is resized.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado depois de uma seleção de traços e/ou elementos é redimensionada.

trans-unit.source: If, instead, you must handle a request to resize a selection before the strokes and/or elements are resized, add an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionResizing> event.
trans-unit.target: Se, em vez disso, você deve lidar com uma solicitação para redimensionar uma seleção antes dos elementos e/ou traços são redimensionados, adicione um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionResizing>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionResizing>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before selected strokes and elements are resized.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes de traços e os elementos são redimensionados.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs after the user requests that a selection of strokes and/or elements be resized, but before the change is applied.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre depois que o usuário solicita que uma seleção de traços e/ou elementos ser redimensionado, mas antes da alteração será aplicada.

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives an argument of type <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs> that contains two properties: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos recebe um argumento do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs>que contém duas propriedades: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> defines the boundaries of the selection before the resizing operation and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A> defines the boundaries of the selection after the resizing operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A>Define os limites da seleção antes da operação de redimensionamento e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>define os limites da seleção após a operação de redimensionamento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the strokes and/or elements are updated with the new size, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionResized> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Depois que os elementos e/ou traços são atualizados com o novo tamanho, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionResized>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionResized>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a stroke drawn by the user is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes*> property.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um traço do usuário é adicionado para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when a user completes a stroke using a pointing device.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado quando o usuário concluir um traço usando um dispositivo apontador.

trans-unit.source: For example, a user might raise a stylus from a digitizer after making a motion, thereby completing a stroke.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um usuário pode gerar uma caneta de um digitalizador depois de fazer um movimento, Concluindo assim um traço.

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives an argument of type <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasStrokeCollectedEventArgs>, which references the completed stroke.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos recebe um argumento de tipo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasStrokeCollectedEventArgs>, que referencia o traço concluído.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasStrokeCollectedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The stroke is also added to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: O traço também é adicionado à <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The programmatic addition of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> object to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> collection does not raise this event.
trans-unit.target: A adição de programação de um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>do objeto para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>coleção não gera esse evento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true` if you want to prevent the stroke from being erased.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> will change the cursor style to reflect the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> while the cursor is within the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: O que <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>irá alterar o estilo de cursor para refletir o atual <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>enquanto o cursor estiver dentro dos limites de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: If this behavior is not wanted, for example, when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> uses a custom cursor, set this property to `true`, and the cursor will not change with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se esse comportamento não é desejado, por exemplo, quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>usa um personalizado cursor, defina essa propriedade como `true`, e o cursor não será alterado com <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref> is using a custom cursor; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref> está usando um cursor personalizado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
